metadata: (info { (description "Tabal is a game played in Malaysia in the nineteenth century. The board is the same as many race games played throughout Europe and Asia, though the specific rules were not documented.") (aliases {"Main Tabal"}) (rules "2x12 board, divided in half, where the spaces are rendered as points. Two six-sided dice.") (source "DLP evidence.") (id "1091") (version "1.3.14") (classification "board/race/escape/reconstruction/pending") (credit "Eric Piette") (origin "This game was played in Malaysia, from around 1886 to 1895.") } ) (graphics { (show Edges Hidden) (board Style Table) (stackType Backgammon) })
